description: { Smallest prime > LCM{1,2,...,n} } - { largest prime < LCM{1,2,...,n} }.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1020
mathematica: f[n_]:=Module[{lcmn=LCM@@Range[n]}, NextPrime[lcmn]-NextPrime[lcmn,-1]]; f/@Range[3,70]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 04 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 01 2001
